alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 6:34PM CST until December 09 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... * Until 730 PM CST. * At 634 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holly Bluff, or 13 miles southeast of Rolling Fork, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tinsley around 645 PM CST. Yazoo City around 650 PM CST. Little Yazoo around 700 PM CST. Benton and Myrleville around 710 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central and west central Mississippi.
